summary.span: 提供建立、複製、刪除、移動和開啟單一檔案的靜態方法，並協助 物件的建立。

span.span: Provides static methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of a single file, and aids in the creation of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，例如複製、 移動、 重新命名、 建立、 開啟、 刪除和一次附加到單一檔案的一般作業。Use the class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, opening, deleting, and appending to a single file at a time. 您也可以使用類別來取得和設定檔屬性或資訊與建立、 存取和寫入的檔案。You can also use the class to get and set file attributes or information related to the creation, access, and writing of a file. 如果您想要在多個檔案上執行作業，請參閱或。If you want to perform operations on multiple files, see or . 許多方法會傳回其他 I/O 類型，當您建立或開啟檔案。Many of the methods return other I/O types when you create or open files. 您可以使用這些其他型別來進一步操作檔案。You can use these other types to further manipulate a file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱特定這類成員， ，或。For more information, see specific members such as , , or . 因為所有方法是靜態的則可能使用更有效率方法，而不是對應執行個體方法，如果您想要執行只能有一個動作。Because all methods are static, it might be more efficient to use a method rather than a corresponding instance method if you want to perform only one action. 所有方法需要您操作檔案的路徑。All methods require the path to the file that you are manipulating. 靜態方法類別執行的所有方法的安全性檢查。The static methods of the class perform security checks on all methods. 如果您要重複使用的物件數次，請考慮使用對應的執行個體方法的相反地，因為安全性檢查會不一定是必要。If you are going to reuse an object several times, consider using the corresponding instance method of instead, because the security check will not always be necessary. 根據預設，新檔案的完整讀取/寫入存取權會授與所有使用者。By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users. 下表描述可用來自訂的各種行為的列舉方法。The following table describes the enumerations that are used to customize the behavior of various methods. |列舉Enumeration|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||指定讀取和寫入檔案的存取權。Specifies read and write access to a file.| ||指定已在使用的檔案所允許的存取層級。Specifies the level of access permitted for a file that is already in use.| ||指定是否保留或覆寫現有檔案的內容和建立的現有檔案的要求是否會造成例外狀況。Specifies whether the contents of an existing file are preserved or overwritten, and whether requests to create an existing file cause an exception.| > [!NOTE] > 接受的路徑做為輸入字串的成員，該路徑必須是語式正確，或引發例外狀況。In members that accept a path as an input string, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised. 比方說，如果路徑是完整名稱，但以空格開頭，路徑不被修剪中類別的方法。For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space, the path is not trimmed in methods of the class. 因此，路徑的格式不正確，而且會引發例外狀況。Therefore, the path is malformed and an exception is raised. 同樣地，路徑的組合無法完整限定兩次。Similarly, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice. 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows，"也會引發例外狀況在大部分情況下。For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception in most cases. 請確定您的路徑是語式正確的當您使用接受路徑字串的方法。Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string. 在接受路徑的成員，路徑可以參考到檔案或只是一個目錄。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory. 指定的路徑也可以參考相對路徑或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑的伺服器和共用的名稱。The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，如果以下所有狀況可接受的路徑：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的 「 c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。"c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic. - "c:\\\MyDir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的 「 c:\mydir\"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - "MyDir\\\MySubdir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的 「 MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - 「\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare 」 在 C# 中，或 「\\\MyServer\MyShare"在 Visual Basic 中。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，以檢查是否存在的檔案，並根據結果，請建立新的檔案，或開啟現有的檔案和讀寫從它。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to check whether a file exists, and depending on the result, either create a new file and write to it, or open the existing file and read from it. 執行程式碼之前, 建立`c:\temp`資料夾。Before running the code, create a `c:\temp` folder. [!code-cpp[File Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/File Class Example/CPP/file class example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[File Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/File Class Example/CS/file class example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[File Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/File Class Example/VB/file class example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在，但不會建立新的目錄，此方法會建立該檔案。The method creates the file if it doesn't exist, but it doesn't create new directories. 因此，windows 7`path`參數必須包含現有的目錄。Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories. ## Examples 下列範例會將範例資料檔中的選取的行寫入檔案，，，然後附加多行。The following example writes selected lines from a sample data file to a file, and then appends more lines. 名為目錄`temp`C 必須存在，此範例才能順利完成的磁碟機上。The directory named `temp` on drive C must exist for the example to complete successfully. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定字串和檔案路徑，這個方法會開啟指定的檔案，將字串附加至檔案的結尾，，然後關閉檔案。Given a string and a file path, this method opens the specified file, appends the string to the end of the file, and then closes the file. 檔案控制代碼保證會關閉這個方法，即使會引發例外狀況。The file handle is guaranteed to be closed by this method, even if exceptions are raised. 如果不存在，但不會建立新的目錄，此方法會建立該檔案。The method creates the file if it doesn't exist, but it doesn't create new directories. 因此，windows 7`path`參數必須包含現有的目錄。Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法將額外的文字新增至檔案結尾。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to add extra text to the end of a file. 在此範例中，如果它尚未存在，而且文字已加入至它建立一個檔案。In this example, a file is created if it doesn't already exist, and text is added to it. 不過，名為目錄`temp`C 必須存在，此範例才能順利完成的磁碟機上。However, the directory named `temp` on drive C must exist for the example to complete successfully. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於建構函式多載。This method is equivalent to the constructor overload. 如果指定的檔案`path`不存在，則會建立它。If the file specified by `path` does not exist, it is created. 如果檔案不存在，寫入作業文字附加至檔案。If the file does exist, write operations to the append text to the file. 讀取檔案開啟時允許額外的執行緒。Additional threads are permitted to read the file while it is open. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對於目前工作目錄，會解譯相對路徑的資訊。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將文字附加至檔案。The following example appends text to a file. 如果檔案不存在，此方法會建立新的檔案。The method creates a new file if the file doesn't exist. 不過，名為目錄`temp`C 必須存在，此範例才能順利完成的磁碟機上。However, the directory named `temp` on drive C must exist for the example to complete successfully. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於方法多載`overwrite`參數設為`false`。This method is equivalent to the method overload with the `overwrite` parameter set to `false`. `sourceFileName`和`destFileName`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `sourceFileName` and `destFileName` parameters can specify relative or absolute path information. 相對於目前工作目錄，會解譯相對路徑的資訊。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱方法。To obtain the current working directory, see the method. 這個方法不支援在參數中的萬用字元。This method does not support wildcard characters in the parameters. 複製的檔案中，會保留原始檔案的屬性。The attributes of the original file are retained in the copied file. ## Examples 下列範例會將檔案複製到 C:\archives\2008 備份資料夾。The following example copies files to the C:\archives\2008 backup folder. 它會使用兩個多載方法，如下所示：It uses the two overloads of the method as follows: - 它會先使用方法多載來複製文字 (.txt) 檔案。It first uses the method overload to copy text (.txt) files. 程式碼會示範這個多載不允許覆寫已複製的檔案。The code demonstrates that this overload does not allow overwriting files that were already copied. - 然後它會使用方法多載來複製圖片 （.jpg 檔案）。It then uses the method overload to copy pictures (.jpg files). 程式碼會示範這個多載，並允許覆寫已複製的檔案。The code demonstrates that this overload does allow overwriting files that were already copied. summary.span: 在指定的路徑中建立或覆寫檔案。

span.span: Creates or overwrites a file in the specified path.

returns.span: ，提供在 中指定之檔案的讀取/寫入存取。

span.span: A that provides read/write access to the file specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所建立的物件具有預設值的值; 任何其他處理程序或程式碼可以存取建立的檔案直到原始的檔案控制代碼已關閉。The object created by this method has a default value of ; no other process or code can access the created file until the original file handle is closed. 這個方法相當於使用 4,096 個位元組的預設緩衝區大小的方法多載。This method is equivalent to the method overload using the default buffer size of 4,096 bytes. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對於目前工作目錄，會解譯相對路徑的資訊。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 如果指定的檔案不存在，則會建立;如果檔案存在，而且不是唯讀，則會覆寫內容。If the specified file does not exist, it is created; if it does exist and it is not read-only, the contents are overwritten. 根據預設，新檔案的完整讀取/寫入存取權會授與所有使用者。By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users. 檔案讀取/寫入存取開啟，且必須先關閉另一個應用程式可以開啟它。The file is opened with read/write access and must be closed before it can be opened by another application. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立在指定的路徑中的檔案、 將某些資訊寫入至檔案，和從檔案讀取。The following example creates a file in the specified path, writes some information to the file, and reads from the file. [!code-cpp[File Create1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/File Create1/CPP/file create1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[File Create1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/File Create1/CS/file create1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[File Create1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/File Create1/VB/file create1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您將使用加密檔案解密方法。The method allows you to decrypt a file that was encrypted using the method. 方法可以解密使用目前的使用者帳戶已加密的檔案。The method can decrypt only files that were encrypted using the current user account. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個 API 只有在能夠使用 NTFS 加密檔案系統 (EFS) 的 Windows 平台上執行。This API is only supported on Windows platforms that are able to use the NTFS Encrypting File System (EFS). 嘗試在非 Windows 系統、 Windows Home Edition 系統或非 NTFS 磁碟機結果中的使用這或，取決於這種情況。Any attempt to use this on non-Windows systems, Windows Home Edition systems, or non-NTFS drives results in a or , depending on the situation. > > 不建議使用此 API 在.NET Core 中;它會包含啟用的應用程式，移至.NET Core，但仍會明確地以 Windows 為目標的可攜性。Use of this API in .NET Core is not recommended; it is included to enable portability for applications that move to .NET Core but still explicitly target Windows. 方法需要獨佔存取權進行解密，該檔案，並會引發例外狀況，如果另一個處理序正在使用檔案。The method requires exclusive access to the file being decrypted, and will raise an exception if another process is using the file. 如果檔案未加密，會傳回非零的值，表示成功。If the file is not encrypted, will return a nonzero value, which indicates success. 這兩個方法和方法使用電腦上安裝並呼叫方法的程序的檔案加密金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。Both the method and the method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method. 目前的檔案系統必須格式化為 NTFS 且目前的作業系統必須 Windows NT 或更新版本。The current file system must be formatted as NTFS and the current operating system must be Windows NT or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法和方法來加密和解密檔案。The following code example uses the method and the method to encrypt and then decrypt a file. 檔案必須存在，範例才能運作。The file must exist for the example to work. [!code-cpp[IO.File.Encrypt-Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.Encrypt-Decrypt/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.Encrypt-Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.Encrypt-Decrypt/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.Encrypt-Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.Encrypt-Decrypt/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您加密檔案，以便只將用來呼叫這個方法的帳戶可以將它解密。The method allows you to encrypt a file so that only the account used to call this method can decrypt it. 使用方法來解密加密的檔案方法。Use the method to decrypt a file encrypted by the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個 API 只有在能夠使用 NTFS 加密檔案系統 (EFS) 的 Windows 平台上執行。This API is only supported on Windows platforms that are able to use the NTFS Encrypting File System (EFS). 嘗試在非 Windows 系統、 Windows Home Edition 系統或非 NTFS 磁碟機結果中的使用這或，取決於這種情況。Any attempt to use this on non-Windows systems, Windows Home Edition systems, or non-NTFS drives results in a or , depending on the situation. > > 不建議使用此 API 在.NET Core 中;它會包含啟用的應用程式，移至.NET Core，但仍會明確地以 Windows 為目標的可攜性。Use of this API in .NET Core is not recommended; it is included to enable portability for applications that move to .NET Core but still explicitly target Windows. 方法需要獨佔存取權所加密的檔案，而且如果另一個處理序正在使用檔案將會失敗。The method requires exclusive access to the file being encrypted, and will fail if another process is using the file. 這兩個方法和方法使用電腦上安裝並呼叫方法的程序的檔案加密金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。Both the method and the method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method. 這個方法並不適用於所有版本的 Windows。This method is not available on all versions of Windows. 比方說，它並不適用於家用版。For example, it is not available on Home editions. 目前的檔案系統必須格式化為 NTFS。The current file system must be formatted as NTFS. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法和方法來加密和解密檔案。The following code example uses the method and the method to encrypt and then decrypt a file. 檔案必須存在，範例才能運作。The file must exist for the example to work. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不應該用於路徑驗證，這個方法只會檢查中是否指定的檔案`path`存在。The method should not be used for path validation, this method merely checks if the file specified in `path` exists. 傳遞至無效的路徑傳回`false`。Passing an invalid path to returns `false`. 若要檢查路徑是否包含任何無效的字元，您可以呼叫方法來擷取檔案系統無效字元。To check whether the path contains any invalid characters, you can call the method to retrieve the characters that are invalid for the file system. 您也可以建立規則運算式來測試是否為您的環境的路徑無效。You can also create a regular expression to test the whether the path is valid for your environment. 如需可接受的路徑的範例，請參閱。For examples of acceptable paths, see . 若要檢查目錄是否存在，請參閱。To check if a directory exists, see . 請注意，另一個處理序可以可能處理的項目檔案在您呼叫的時間之間方法和另一個對檔案執行作業，例如。Be aware that another process can potentially do something with the file in between the time you call the method and perform another operation on the file, such as . `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對於目前工作目錄，會解譯相對路徑的資訊。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 如果`path`描述的目錄中，這個方法會傳回`false`。If `path` describes a directory, this method returns `false`. 從已移除尾端空格`path`參數，然後再判斷檔案是否存在。Trailing spaces are removed from the `path` parameter before determining if the file exists. 方法會傳回`false`如果嘗試判斷指定的檔案是否存在時發生任何錯誤。The method returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists. 可能發生這種情況下，會引發例外狀況，例如傳遞檔名無效的字元或太多字元、 失敗或遺失的磁碟，或如果呼叫端沒有讀取檔案的權限。This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷檔案是否存在。The following example determines if a file exists. ACL 描述個人及/或群組，或沒有，在指定的檔案上的特定動作的權限。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 在 NTFS 環境中，並如果使用者已對使用者授與父資料夾上的權限。In NTFS environments, and are granted to the user if the user has rights on the parent folder. 若要拒絕並，拒絕父目錄上。To deny and , deny on the parent directory. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用而方法來新增，然後再移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目，從檔案。The following code example uses the and the methods to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對於目前工作目錄，會解譯相對路徑的資訊。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 如果檔案中所述`path`參數不存在，這個方法會傳回 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜If the file described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 調整為當地時間。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. NTFS 格式化磁碟機可能會快取檔案，例如檔案建立時間，短的一段時間的相關資訊。NTFS-formatted drives may cache information about a file, such as file creation time, for a short period of time. 如此一來，可能需要明確地將設定檔的建立時間，如果您要覆寫或取代現有的檔案。As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範`GetCreationTime`。The following example demonstrates `GetCreationTime`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法適用於磁碟區，它不會擲回例外狀況如果來源和目的地都相同。This method works across disk volumes, and it does not throw an exception if the source and destination are the same. 請注意，是否您嘗試將相同名稱的檔案移到該目錄來取代檔案，您收到。Note that if you attempt to replace a file by moving a file of the same name into that directory, you get an . 您無法使用 Move 方法覆寫現有檔案。You cannot use the Move method to overwrite an existing file. `sourceFileName`和`destFileName`引數可以包含相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `sourceFileName` and `destFileName` arguments can include relative or absolute path information. 相對於目前工作目錄，會解譯相對路徑的資訊。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 如果您嘗試在 磁碟區之間移動檔案和檔案正在使用中，將檔案複製到目的地，但不是會從來源刪除。If you try to move a file across disk volumes and that file is in use, the file is copied to the destination, but it is not deleted from the source. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將檔案移。The following example moves a file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於檔案模式設定為建構函式多載，若要設定的存取權，並將共用模式設定為。This method is equivalent to the constructor overload with file mode set to , the access set to , and the share mode set to . 方法開啟的檔案，如果其中一個已存在的檔案路徑，或如果不存在的話，會建立新的檔案。The method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist. 現有的檔案，它不會將新的文字附加至現有的文字。For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text. 相反地，它會覆寫現有的字元以新的字元。Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters. 如果您覆寫較長的字串 （例如，"This is OpenWrite 方法的測試)"較短的字串 （例如 「 第二個執行 」），檔案將包含混合的字串 ("第二個 runtest OpenWrite 方法的")。If you overwrite a longer string (such as "This is a test of the OpenWrite method") with a shorter string (such as "Second run"), the file will contain a mix of the strings ("Second runtest of the OpenWrite method"). `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information. 相對於目前工作目錄，會解譯相對路徑的資訊。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請使用方法。To obtain the current working directory, use the method. 傳回不支援讀取。The returned does not support reading. 若要開啟用於讀取和寫入檔案時，使用。To open a file for both reading and writing, use . 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會開啟用於讀取和寫入檔案。The following example opens a file for reading and writing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會開啟一個檔案，讀取的檔案，每一行，然後將每一行新增為字串陣列的項目。This method opens a file, reads each line of the file, then adds each line as an element of a string array. 然後，它會關閉檔案。It then closes the file. 會定義為一串字元後面接著歸位字元 ('\r')，換行字元 ('\n') 或歸位字元後面緊跟著一條線換行字元。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return ('\r'), a line feed ('\n'), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed. 產生的字串不包含終止的歸位字元和/或換行字元。The resulting string does not contain the terminating carriage return and/or line feed. 這個方法會嘗試自動偵測編碼的位元組順序標記存在為基礎的檔案。This method attempts to automatically detect the encoding of a file based on the presence of byte order marks. 編碼格式的 utf-8 和 UTF-32 （big endian 和位元組由小到大） 可以偵測到。Encoding formats UTF-8 and UTF-32 (both big-endian and little-endian) can be detected. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法，以顯示檔案的內容。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to display the contents of a file. 在此範例會建立檔案，如果它尚未存在，而且文字已加入至它所示。In this example a file is created, if it doesn't already exist, and text is added to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會開啟一個檔案，讀取在檔案中的所有文字，並以字串形式傳回它。This method opens a file, reads all the text in the file, and returns it as a string. 然後，它會關閉檔案。It then closes the file. 這個方法會嘗試自動偵測編碼的位元組順序標記存在為基礎的檔案。This method attempts to automatically detect the encoding of a file based on the presence of byte order marks. 編碼格式的 utf-8 和 UTF-32 （big endian 和位元組由小到大） 可以偵測到。Encoding formats UTF-8 and UTF-32 (both big-endian and little-endian) can be detected. 使用方法多載時讀取檔案，其中可能包含匯入的文字，因為無法辨識的字元可能無法正確讀取。Use the method overload when reading files that might contain imported text, because unrecognized characters may not be read correctly. 檔案控制代碼保證會關閉這個方法，即使會引發例外狀況。The file handle is guaranteed to be closed by this method, even if exceptions are raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法，以顯示檔案的內容。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to display the contents of a file. 在此範例會建立檔案，如果它尚未存在，而且文字已加入至它所示。In this example a file is created, if it doesn't already exist, and text is added to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法的差異，如下所示：當您使用，您可以開始列舉字串的集合，傳回整個集合之前，當您使用，您必須等待才能存取陣列傳回整個字串的陣列。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of strings before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of strings be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用非常大的檔案，可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with very large files, can be more efficient. 您可以使用方法來執行下列動作：You can use the method to do the following: - 執行[LINQ to Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73cafe73-37cf-46e7-bfa7-97c7eea7ced9)檔，以取得篩選的一份其程式碼行上的查詢。Perform [LINQ to Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73cafe73-37cf-46e7-bfa7-97c7eea7ced9) queries on a file to obtain a filtered set of its lines. - 寫入與檔案的行傳回的集合方法，或將它們附加至現有的檔案與方法。Write the returned collection of lines to a file with the method, or append them to an existing file with the method. - 建立立即填入的集合的執行個體採用集合，這些字串的建構函式，例如或。Create an immediately populated instance of a collection that takes an collection of strings for its constructor, such as a or a . 這個方法會使用編碼的值。This method uses for the encoding value. ## Examples 下列範例會讀取檔案，以尋找包含指定的字串的行程式碼。The following example reads the lines of a file to find lines that contain specified strings. [!code-csharp[System.IO.File.ReadLines#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.file.readlines/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.File.ReadLines#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.file.readlines/vb/program.vb#1)] 下列範例會使用列舉之檔案的副檔名為.txt 的所有目錄的 LINQ 查詢中的方法讀取的檔案，每一行，並顯示的行，如果它包含字串"Microsoft"。The following example uses the method in a LINQ query that enumerates all directories for files that have a .txt extension, reads each line of the file, and displays the line if it contains the string "Microsoft". [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.directory.enumeratefiles/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.directory.enumeratefiles/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來指定要使用的編碼方式讀取檔案。Use this method to specify an encoding to use read the file. 和方法的差異，如下所示：當您使用，您可以啟動之前就會傳回整個集合列舉字串的集合。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of strings before the whole collection is returned. 當您使用，您必須等待才能存取陣列傳回整個字串的陣列。When you use , you must wait for the whole array of strings be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用非常大的檔案，可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with very large files, can be more efficient. 您可以使用方法來執行下列動作：You can use the method to do the following: - 執行[LINQ to Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73cafe73-37cf-46e7-bfa7-97c7eea7ced9)檔，以取得篩選的一份其程式碼行上的查詢。Perform [LINQ to Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73cafe73-37cf-46e7-bfa7-97c7eea7ced9) queries on a file to obtain a filtered set of its lines. - 寫入與檔案的行傳回的集合方法，或將它們附加至現有的檔案與方法。Write the returned collection of lines to a file with the method, or append them to an existing file with the method. - 建立立即填入的集合的執行個體採用集合，這些字串的建構函式，例如或。Create an immediately populated instance of a collection that takes an collection of strings for its constructor, such as a or a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會指定檔案的內容取代為另一個檔案的內容。The method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file. 它也會建立已取代檔案的備份。It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced. 如果`sourceFileName`和`destinationFileName`會位於不同的磁碟區，這個方法會引發例外狀況。If the `sourceFileName` and `destinationFileName` are on different volumes, this method will raise an exception. 如果`destinationBackupFileName`是在原始程式檔從不同的磁碟區，將執行的動作會刪除備份檔案。If the `destinationBackupFileName` is on a different volume from the source file, the backup file will be deleted. 傳遞`null`至`destinationBackupFileName`參數，如果您不想建立的已取代的檔案備份。Pass `null` to the `destinationBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced. 如果`destinationBackupFileName`已經將使用的內容覆寫`destinationFileName`檔案。If the `destinationBackupFileName` already exists it will be overwritten with the contents of the `destinationFileName` file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來取代另一個檔案中的檔案，並建立已取代檔案的備份。The following code example uses the method to replace a file with another file and create a backup of the replaced file. span.span: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a object to the specified file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法適用於存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的檔案。The method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list. > [!CAUTION] > 指定 ACL`fileSecurity`參數已取代現有檔案的 ACL。The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file. 若要新增之新使用者的權限，請使用方法，以取得現有的 ACL，修改它，然後再使用套用回到檔案。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use to apply it back to the file. ACL 描述個人及/或群組，或沒有，在指定的檔案上的特定動作的權限。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 方法仍然只存在物件建立後已修改的物件。The method persists only objects that have been modified after object creation. 如果不修改物件，它不會保存至檔案。If a object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file. 因此，不可以擷取物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同的物件。Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a object from one file and reapply the same object to another file. 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個：To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1. 使用方法來擷取從原始程式檔的物件。Use the method to retrieve the object from the source file. 2. 建立新目的地檔案的物件。Create a new object for the destination file. 3. 使用或是來源方法擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。Use the or method of the source object to retrieve the ACL information. 4. 使用或是方法，以將資訊複製到目的地的步驟 3 中所擷取物件。Use the or method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination object. 5. 設定目的地目的地檔案使用的物件方法。Set the destination object to the destination file using the method. 在 NTFS 環境中，並如果使用者已對使用者授與父資料夾上的權限。In NTFS environments, and are granted to the user if the user has rights on the parent folder. 若要拒絕並，拒絕父目錄上。To deny and , deny on the parent directory. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用和方法來新增，然後再移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目，從檔案。The following code example uses the and methods to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]
